O1-LgzUh-4LcuHHAwvisPg.text: This is by far the best restaurant I've ever been to in the whole world! Number one for sure! It's Asian and italian food. So you can find there pretty much anything you are in the mood for. And everything comes with amazing food presentation and taste. On top of it there is the outstanding 6 star service and always beautiful fancy crowd. It's the "IT" place to hang out and eat at in London (again, according to my experiences; best in the world). Unbeatable!

j0EcEZpfXr8eims236euRQ.text: Having been made to wait 40 minutes for a pre-booked table, things didn't get off to the best of starts. Complimentary drinks were provided to soften the blow but having to stand around the bustling bar was certainly not ideal. When we finally got seated, we were treated to a wonderful asian meal with lots of good portions of flavourful food. There was lots to choose from for vegetarians and the attentive and friendly staff were more than happy to help to pick out the best of these. I understand that these days it's quite 'cool' and 'hip' for the lights to be low and music loud - much like a culinary version of an Abercrombie & Fitch store, but after a while it did become tiresome having to shout across the table just to hold a conversation.

zqkWLmIxbapBb_3mHjHbzA.text: Been here twice, once in the Asian part and another time in the Italian. Everything is tasty, the menu is full of choices. Prices are really high, but it is called the best restaurant in London, so you can't really expect something else. Choose this for a special dinner and you will get a chance to feel the excellence in everything - food, service and surroundings. Always crowded, reservation is definitely needed and do it as soon as possible!

s5lxpkCx6L2k0VqBemuKog.text: Great food, fantastic service and downstairs club! this is a great place if not a bit pricing but then location is everything.So the experienced started with the idea of a quick drink in the sunshine, sat outside and the very attentive staff come out took our orders, started with an excellent if not overpriced Pinot Grigio, then moved onto some Martin cocktails, which were recommended by our waiter, I had mine with onions but didn't really feel it, decided that we should eat and looking inside saw the two restaurants Asian fusion and Italian, decided on Asian, we asked our waiter if there were tables and he seamed to think it wouldn't be possible, but he took us inside and introduced us to the reservation team, who said it may be tricky, but if we waited at the bar they would see what they could do, so stayed on the cocktail theme and the bar tender suggested a raspberry Martin cocktail, which also had orange zest, I wasn't crazy about it but I believe in trying these things.We waited for no more than 30 mins and they found us a table, which was great as the place was very busy, I know why, the food was fantastic, I didn't want a large meal, so we had a selection of starters and side courses including spicy edame, tuna & advocation maki, along with some shrimp & coriander dim sum all awesome but the langoustine tempura was out of this world, loved it.We were then asked if we would be interested in moving downstairs to the club area as they needed the table, they had been so good in accommodating us we agreed and moved downstairs to a very exclusive feeling club area, more cocktails and the whole experience lasted from 5pm till 2am, time flys when your having fun!Some of you may have seen that I NEVER give a place 5 stars on my first visit, but the staff here blew me away they were so helpful and accommodating, it deserves nothing less.Can't recommend this place more,PS/ sorry no pictures my phone died early on in the evening, but this place needs to be experienced in the flesh.

0YKZvy8YHukVlW2qiqY63A.text: Great venue... Went to the Asian fusion restaurant then downstairs to the bar afterwards... Great for large groups....

hwNz8KEsTjN3AR_k0xLN1w.text: I had a great lunch, very impressed! Im not usually a fan of sea food but I went to the Asian side and really liked the crab,apple and Wasabi salad and the baby squid starter. The Chilean sea bass in chilli sauce jar delicious, and I recommend the kimchi rice!

opcSEDQweHfMe4B2lfUlQw.text: so when i go to a restaurant i think of the following being important:food, ambience, price.i went to the italian restaurant and found the menu really interesting - really enjoyed the  vegetarian sides and im not a european cuisine vegetable fan so thats saying alot from me!!! the restaurant is beautifully decorated and when i was there i almost felt like i was in italy :) loved the indoor plants and the fact that our waiters were italian. i enjoyed the ambience very much.the food is expensive but its a great place to go for a special occasion and when u want to spend alot.i love people watching. at this restaurant you are surrounded by wealthy russians and i saw this one stunning woman on a table near me head to toe in diamonds!!! amazing! im a girl so i appreciate that sort of thing ;) lolthe bar is lovely and the asian restaurant is on my list to go to next.

uA563tDnfwJminbDRKFfwQ.text: It was a very nice place to sit down and be surrounded by pretty people and eat nice food. But don't go for the spicy lobster. It was not very nice.

nlnp9QK4KWiPSW5tXxKx_Q.text: This place has two restaurants.  We ate at the Italian one and it was great.  They have a neat down downstairs bar.  The atmosphere was hustling and the prices were....well...london prices.

9E9jQihQCKtxsq4jIOeK5g.text: What a great atmosphere...I went to the Italien restaurant...ordered the Risotto and they offered me parmesan for my dish, it tasted awful!! So salty, I could NOT eat it. I complained to the Asisstant Manager who was very nice and she told me that it wasn't uncommon that parmesan ruins dishes like that which I understood. But why did they offer me parmesan?!! Wasn't too impressed...but still a nice place

YTxz7RucjYDQYuR14ERzxw.text: We reserved to eat at the Asian restaurant. The food was delicious. Great drinks at the bar too!

z1RiUsU1wjW4kNmUC2btaw.text: WAAAAAAY Overpriced, food was average, although my partner seemed happy with his meal, service was OK, but there was ZERO atmosphere in the venue! They had a huge screen playing the football with the volume up, when we asked if they could turn it down (because we were paying $120 for a pizza and an average of $100 per meal) they refused. Not impressed.

NHqlRbxKyTJnobNSGBAudw.text: we had our dinner tonight put we face one thing that was one of our friends who use to come and unfortunately the manager doesn't like him and he had a trouble action with him long time ago so by purpose he told the staff to treat us in bad way that was rude a except one of the staff she was a girl  i think from china .

v_vxpeWMuVr8BziZRoW0GQ.text: It's a good place to meet friends, though quite pricey for the quality of food the restaurant offers. Anyways I'm loving the spicy crab rolls and the scallops with asparagus, so yummy.

sdO3XiV6Gn4z0gwINXfNyQ.text: The food in the Asian restaurant is good- upscale asian  chinese, japanese, fusion and all pretty decadent. The bar downstairs is so trendy you are instantly checking it hurts. Dim lights, high ceilings and good looking people everywhere. Yes it is overpriced, yes the service is average, and yes you will just love it. Novikov, so hot right now.

d1Yh2j1EDTOJmoJjPiFOnw.text: Nice place but used to be better. Food ok but quite expensive. Bar ok but too crowded.

_lfV5WHaLBx4a6O6tKO5uA.text: what a shame, such a nice place but the staff are very rude and not helpfull. shame

XWf1dFp5_rGP-21wNpx7CA.text: This was the 2nd time I had dined at Novikov Asian restaurant, but most certainly the last. We had a reservation at 915pm for 6 people. We arrived and checked in at 916. They told us "your table is almost ready, please wait for a moment at the bar and we will call you when it is ready". The bar was packed with people and I noticed in the next 20 minutes that no one was being taken to their table. So I went to inquire again. "Just a few more minutes". Look, I said, we are here for my friend's birthday. We have been waiting 20 minutes, how long will it really be? "About 10-15" she tells me. We waited an hour and 5 minutes. If she had said about 30 minutes, we would have left. Instead, we stayed because the manager came over and took our coats, was very pleasant and gave us all champagne cocktails on the house for the birthday. Ok, so we kind of forgive them for making us wait (kind of). We finally are seated, the food is good, no problems there, but it came out super fast. Almost too fast. Like we were being rushed. Then we order coffee and dessert. Two bites into the dessert, a waiter comes over and whispers, "We need the table back, would you mind moving to the bar area. I will bring over your desserts." Excuse me? No, we do not want to wait in the overpacked bar. We will finish here. He leaves. 5 minutes later he is back. "I'm sorry, but I have pressure from the next clients that they want the table now. Would you like me to get your coats?" What about your present clients?? Fine, save us a trip and go get them. We give him the ticket and he comes back one coat short. He fights with us that there was no other coat. He goes to check and lo and behold there it is. Now he tells us, "Ok, now you have your coats. Please follow me to the bar, I will give you each a glass of champagne on the house but your two hours are up." (We had been told several times upon booking the table, that we have it for two hours only). Now I am mad. "Yes, we have been here for two hours, you are correct, but we have been seated at this table just under one hour because you made us wait so long at the bar. No i do not want free champagne. What I would like is to finish this outrageously expensive meal in peace without being bothered by you anymore. We have a whole hour left and intend to use it. Suffice to say, the entire experience was awful. We were all mad the whole evening and the birthday girl was upset. We will not be going back ever.

k7TNHoj925eDzuuW1-pTfA.text: Lacks a real niche - ok for a corporate place (hedge fund/banker folk) but not as good food as a Zuma/Nobu/Zafferano's etc (it's got an Asian and Italian restaurant).  Kind of soulless, wouldn't go on my own dime, and on a broker's dime would prefer better places.  Food is neither 'authentic' nor 'fine'. And the lounge/bar downstairs just tries too hard.  Pass.

Fze6Fxl3KF_xm_sbYsuYyQ.text: Excellent food, service .. More than 5stars  Love you Novikov!!!

xCI3T39zPfS5jJDjINqLmg.text: With mixed feelings I am giving this place a 3-star rating. I was almost about to give only 2 and that is not for the lack of food quality. We went to this place with some colleagues after a training based on a recommendation and in the end I left the place with a bitter sweet taste due to the hole in my wallet. So to be fair, the food was pretty excellent. We had fantastic sashimi, great fish with some turmeric seasoning as well as some really good sushi rolls. Our wine was pretty delicious as well. However what really did not sit well with me was the price. I know it is London and yes things are expensive here but no dinner in the world is worth 120 pounds per person. And we had not been really asked by the staff what we were looking to spend and/or eat, I know they are salesmen and want to give us a good time and make good money. But in the end the price-value ratio was really not worth it. The ambience of the place I would rate as ok but not particularly great either to be quite honest. So all in all, I probably wouldn't come here again but if you have infinite funds and want to be spoiled maybe this is not the worst place to go.

FhyAXoXZCYOJZwx4tSV2vA.text: Best Asian Fusion in London. I've been to many pan-Asian restaurants like Buddha Bar, Hakkasan etc. Novikov stands out with everything from the freshness of the food (in a open market!!), great services (knowledge about each dish and flavour) and the taste of dishes (most important!). I tried dim sum, Mali rolls and grilled food which are all excellent. Strongly recommended the tempura roll (incredibly crispy), frog legs and black truffle scallop. Definitely will come back.

0fML9QGgSh1BMuW0JlR2mA.text: What i liked: 1. The ambiance (very posh/beautiful flower arrangements)2. The watermelon juice shot served as soon as we were seatedWe were in the Asian gallery. Very beautiful restaurant with an open kitchen that is separated by a glass. the design of the restaurant is beautiful and would be a great date spot. However...the food is salty. Everyone at the table agreed. The dim sum.... not the best i've had... the only thing that was good was the fried rice unfortunately. I expected more. Yes it's expensive..but if it's good~ it's always worth it... hmm but this place..not so good~Honestly, did not know this restaurant was so popular~ but I got the feeling it definitely was a be seen kind of place...

j1uhWhYm4aaLoFQhs_ETMA.text: Amazing establishment Went here with my husband for my first time in London I was only there for two days and I was so impressed the first night that I went the very next day again ! The food was amazing , everything fresh and picked out of a fresh food and fish bar they have . The drinks were beautiful decorated and tasted delicious i had the " don't call me baby" which was made to perfection . You can't miss out on the wagyu tacos probably one of the popular appetizers on the menu . It was so good we ordered 3 orders and the sweet and sour chicken amazing , the kimchee fried rice we ordered it with chicken. Everything on the menu was very very GOOD ! the service was also awesome the server was awesome on the first night the only downfall I had is the server the next night we went didn't give us last call and when was closing couldn't bring a Coca Cola because they didn't sell it we continually kept asking which left my friend without anything to drink with his meal . But other than that everything was great ! Def. coming back

YIsah70UBKO52tiSJfndag.text: Awful service - seriously , this sets a new bar in a city with very erratic standards of service anyway : we needed to re order coffee and drinks orders many times over the course of our long lunch. Waiters seemed perpetually confused and disorganised. The food was ok- nothing that special - quite dumpy in many cases.  That said , the Peking Duck was excellent.

MGLuEodK3f4LeE5wd5_dLQ.text: I wish I could give this restaurant two seperate reviews for the two experiences.  One positive and one negative.I stopped in here for a very late dinner after arriving in London close to midnight.  It was across the street from my hotel and looked very nice.  The kitchens were technically closed but they made accomodations for me in the lounge to order from the starters menu which I greatly appreciated.  Very nice, and the service was good.  A bit pricey as my glass of wine was 18 pounds which is like $29.  A bit outrageous so check the price before you order as I did not.  It was a nice place however and the service was very good.The other restaurants within Novikov looked very good so I arrived again very late the next night, after having a full day, and was greeted by a very large bouncer at the door who wanted to refuse me entrance.  Didn't realize that was the type of place this was.  I might try it again, getting there earlier, but given any glimpse of attitude at the door, I'll chose somwhere else.  Mayfair is a nice area and there are many other nice places to choose from.

DPMDUiEgu50hRYASP019_Q.text: Vibrant and large restaurant.  The good and service were very good.  We ate in the Italian part.  There is also an Asian section.  I'd go back

QDI3BoGZ-tMgdFsyiYRcNA.text: Cool seclusive bar downstairs with nice mood lighting. There's a huge range of spirits with some nice whiskeys available on the menu, as well as tequilas and vodkas. The staff were friendly and asked how everything was, but not on a level where it was annoying. The only problem was the prices, where I could buy the same drink for half the cost somewhere else.

T4K1HAJt4db9TnpqUni24A.text: I am putting 3 stars because of the lovely atmosphere! I went here for a friends birthday and we has reservations for the Asian side however we were a bit late and they could only fit us in for the Italian side. I ordered gnocci and it was not anything special, and not really even good. Don't order it. My friends seemed to have great meals though! We had alot of fun at the bar downstairs but the rules are strict, be careful and don't think that you can get too wild, even if you ordered the biggest bottle of vodka in the place. I think it may have been better if we had gotten to try the Asian cuisine.

Mh7GUcC9UE00rsd-OaVo1w.text: Nice ambient good for big groups , love the roast lamb dish and the fresh juices. Don't forget to order the mèrang  cake

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

cmCFVLnk178_jFevIGZn0g.text: I've been here for the Italian food and lounge downstairs. It's definitely a very busy, hip place to be but the service isn't very good, the food is a hit or miss depending what you order, but the drinks are always good.For the Italian dinner I've had the beef tartare, the white pizza, langoustines with garlic, and Bronzino cooked in foil with clams which weren't bad but not amazing. 2 dishes that were really good were the Pappardelle with Bolognese and the Whole Bronzino cooked incrusted with salt. The sauce and pasta were very fresh and the fish was cooked to perfection unlike the Bronzino cooked in foil.Overall I like the scene and the food is ok. Next time I'll have to try the Asian side.

OTSwu7H2PWt27iNs7cQdmg.text: Amazing food, brilliant atmosphere and the food is delicious. Slightly over priced but worth the money. Would definitely return.

6EUNHSDDtRviFrha3bEJcg.text: Excellent food but always crowded , try the black cod and the fried squid it's delicious , one off the best in london

Ck79d2rZSDvwGHPGTQ___w.text: So so bad the staff shout into customers  they dont have the ability to deal with the reservations and say not polite words .... Never ever seen like this before

9wyub_ig2weyyNwYWgA3Xg.text: Asian fusion + hot girls + rich men = NovikovI have been in the asian restaurant three times, not yet in the italian. The place is nice, the atmosphere is cool, sometimes a little bit weird because of the mix between romantic dinners and single groups looking for hunting.Talking about the food, sometimes you could forget that you are there for eating, is nice, very good quality. The quantity is quite poor but not ridiculous.The best point is the after dinner-lunch downstairs, it has a club to have drinks and try to chat up with...whoever you want.It is a very funny place to go with friends and a global experience if you want a easy transition between the dinner and the drinks.

EFnijSBLKgpoxIE7ZLHWHg.text: Consider a night at Novikov pan Asian side both dinner and theater! Chef Jeff Tyler brings his gift for flavors applied to fresh seafood. He has developed exquisite preparations (try the scallops with fantastic sauce and the beef with fois gras dumplings) over a career in London, Morocco, Japan and New Zealans. Service is just perfect. Ask to sit near the glass tween you and the art-like baskets of fish and veggies. Amazing colors and textures. And a view of the awesome kitchen at work. People watching is a plus in the Asian side. We will return again and again. And tell all our friends

4h_h8OJrTDGZuPdIDbqp-A.text: Loved this place! Went for champagne with friends in there lounge on the bottom floor. Amazing feel and decor. And fantastic service!

KXK9rkzx6I47ju3wSGnAmA.text: Novikov is Arkady Novikov's rather over the top outpost in Mayfair. With 2 separate restaurants (Asian and Italian---more to come on that) and a bustling underground bar, all in one gigantic space, Novikov might very well be London's lagest restaurant.The Italian restaurant in particular was overly showy. It can only be described as Vegas-like. Seriously, it looked like a fancier version of a Vegas Cheesecake Factory in epic proportions.Alas, I ate in the slightly more understated Asian section of the restaurant. The Asian menu is diverse and offers a countless selection of dishes that pan most pacific rim countries. Overall the food was well presented. I really liked the Malaysian pork buns, the grilled rib eye and some of the sushi rolls I sampled. However, we also ordred the grilled unagi...at £44 it's one pricey piece of eel...unfortunately it was as disgusting as it was pricey. It tasted like galvanized rubber. I rarely rarely send back a dish, but this one had to go back. The reason though why I'm giving Novikov 3 stars instead of 1 or 2...is the response from the restaurant. The GM came by to apologize and offered to comp the eel and gave us some free sushi rolls. A few moments later the chef also came by all apologetic. he said he tasted the eel and said we were correct that it was definitley not right and something was wrong with the charcoal and to him it tasted like lighter fluid. He was genuinely apologetic. 2 minutes later he returned with some unagi nigri to show us that he could make eel properly. To Novikov's credit they handled this situation perfectly and I left with a much better (and less burnt rubbery) taste in my mouth.Overall, Novikov is overly flashy and expensive though for some people that might fit the bill. Hence the 3 star rating.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

0VwDnqyiqMfTUCeCTWY-3g.text: This is not a restaurant review. I went here with a girl after dinner on a Friday just to go downstairs to the club. The music was very loud but generally good. It was a lively atmosphere and I did enjoy staying there because of that. The crowd was fun but if I were there alone or with guys I would have struggled to find someone I wanted to talk or dance with. Drinks were expensive as expected so for these reasons it's only a 3 rating. I may try a Saturday night but wouldn't try Friday again.

eXKioAM_pU2miIxLeqpq7w.text: The Russians are at it again, and have scored a huge hit with Novikov.  This restaurant is actually two restaurants in one - there is an Italian area, and an Asian area.  We didn't try the Italian, but the Asian was absolutely delicious.  From the moment you arrive, you are slammed in the face with swankiness, with a little bridge and tunnel thrown in.   From the door men to the sleek decor, everything oozes late night London.  You start off at a gorgeous bar, making the best martinis ever.  After a ridiculously long wait, you get to eat.  A lot.  Everything is absolutely delicious.  Especially the miso glazed cod and the fried beef and foie gras.  You can walk past the glassed in kitchen and see everyone hard at work.  Really an amazing kitchen.  And compared to other restaurants in the fancy category the prices are actually ok.   I can't wait to go back!

1wjCV_Bxq38xb9mdOcR60Q.text: Excellent!Chanced on this place and was quite impressed.  Dim sum were among the best I've had (including on my many, many trips through Asia).  The truffle duck was fantastic and the fried rice was brilliant.  The freshness and presentation of the food outstanding.  And apple crumble with rosemary ice cream for desert was unique and delicious.And our server was attentive, friendly, readily available but not hovering and did a good job making our visit even more pleasant.I highly recommend this restaurant.

cP_dqDva_73RMpf3v14WXA.text: Very pleased with my experience at Novikov. My most recent visit was my second at Novikov's Asian fusion restaurant. The food is excellent. I would recommend the Hamachi Carpaccio and Peking Duck Foie Gras for starters. The service is excellent as well; our server was very attentive, friendly, and gave us suggestions catered to my group. My reservation was at 19:00 on a Sunday: the restaurant was relatively empty at the time. Music gave a good ambiance, the volume not too loud. Overall the atmosphere was classy but comfy. Next time I visit London I will definitely visit again.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Mango & Passion Fruit Pannacotta with Fresh Fruit Mochi Selection
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Wagyu Sirloin
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. King Crab Leg Tempura

aMSriB3X5dVX7RR6js1n6Q.text: It's good but I found the food in the Asian part a little too salty, the miso is too big and metal spoons really? Otherwise sushi is fresh!!Enjoy.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

L2h9lpaJ63DJkYNg2Eidzw.text: Love this place. I went to the one in Dubai and now London ..Trendy and modern .. Their food is great .. service is very good . Their fish is fresh .. really fresh ..

xdA1YEetJ5m3iuIFVRbANQ.text: Love the Asian side. One of my favorite restaurants. Get a bunch of small plates and multiple bottles of wine.

e7S6RyjmdPoG9PoEytHEFw.text: If restaurants were actresses then Novikov would be Lindsay Lohan. Spectacular start, bit wobbly after a few years then the cracks start to appear.It's de rigeur for most London restaurants to bolt on an 'In-crowd Lounge' At Novikovs particular incarnation the experience you will have is directly proportional to the time of day. Heading in to the weekend and late in to the night the Lounge gets very busy. I have always been here in a crowd and post midnight. Nod to the wise ...would not recommend it for loners or couples as some of the 'regular ladies' can get a  bit intrusive to say the least. If you are a celeb spotter then you can chance upon quite a few familiar faces in the rooms or the lounge, EPL faces are regularly seen here.Never had a bad meal in either the Asian or Italian rooms here and I should think not based on the price they charge. My personal preference is the Asian side as the staff there are not as arsey as the Italian room.One thing for sure, you will have an experience here every time .. 50/50 on if that will be good or bad, hence the 3*

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. The Royal seal ... Prince Harry (Potter)

YO2zh01qPV1p0vJcq5yQUw.text: It's a good restaurant for Instagram ... Yes I took lot pretty pictures but almost forgot the food. But for real, food is great, the bar , Italian , Asian. casual or date, All in ! The Italian one 's ushers is so pretty...

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. And I love the beautiful food ..
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Haha I love asian food
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

tuaZaExiFeVZ3171zTen8w.text: Usually go to the lounge area for drinks, decent drinks in a fun atmosphere with really good music. Can be a bit of a hassle on the door to get in, but that depends on what time you arrive and the ratio of your group.

4K2ocQsyp2DZcLohcIGlhg.text: I went to the Italian side of Novikov and was very impressed. The place itself was busy and booming and the interior was tasteful. We were greeted at the main entrance and there was a cloakroom at the front desk. The food was delicious and the waitress was attentive and polite, which made the experience comfortable. Overall, I was glad to have finally had the Novikov experience! Next time, I will probably try out the Asian side of the restaurant

najbyjPyjdA_-j4s9THGXA.text: This place.... I could write a book on Novikov, as I am one of its more affectionate guests and return customers. So one might wonder why I gave it three stars instead of taking my next Tinder date on it #TreatTheBaesRight Who knows, really. This place has great food, both in the italian section and the asian section, which is why I return all the time. Yes of course it's pricey, but you know this going in. Their sea bass and bream are always outstanding, as are the lamb and all the raw entrees, the wine list is extensive and the wait staff is knowledgeable and attentive. Also, the desserts are Jesus, and I never use this word lightly. So back to the three stars. For me, it's the people, the sleazy bar downstairs ( though the music is cool and I shake my booty like JLO's spirit animal), the bevy of call girls, mannerless tourists, baby blue Ferraris out front and above-the-muscle saline boobs. It makes this experience cheap for me, and I hate it cause they have this one passion fruit dessert that is the panty dropper of desserts if there ever was one.

mdXX5qLuhNL3kAjVjNTfxA.text: Novikov seriously served up some of the best food I have had in my life! I found this place after coming in from a long flight to London. I walked about two blocks from The Mayfair Hotel, saw the sign, and decided to give it a try.The ambiance is amazing. It is super classy but also hip and not overly posh. I was informed they have both Asian and Italian restaurants and decided to go with the Asian one.I'll keep the review short and sweet-- I was so freakin glad I found this place! The Tofu Mango Rolls were OUT OF THIS WORLD! You have to try them if you are in the area. All of the dishes were light, refreshing, flavorful and tasty.I also found the service to be impeccable. The server recommended many items that I was hesitant to try at first but they ended up being delicious. The exotic fruit platter is also a must at the end of your meal!Great cuisine, ambiance, and character. This place is a true unexpected gem! Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Exotic Fruit Platter
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Mixed Greens
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Crispy Eggplant!

oPtqtyjniLq2oJ2iLjgtBA.text: Went to the Italian side of thr restaurant for friend's birthday dinner and must say the service was impeccable, the atmosphere was great and the food divine... Highly recommended

bHfzwypujdlXYOH2v3ae_A.text: Worst place to dine, staff is rude, chaos everywhere, if you arrive on time they make you queue for so long to be seated at the table that you booked for on advance and paid a deposit for. they let in who ever pays more, and if you're late they don't seat you. Worst chaos on earth never dine there. I have zero respect for this place, very disrespectful.

qVVhlEKsaRvvW_U2krf8Yw.text: Was told we had to pay 30 pounds each to get in even though we were meeting friends who were already inside and they hadn't paid any entry fee.  Then we were told to get from under their awning in the rain as we tried to contact our friends inside to leave.  Just because you are trying to be "exclusive" and fancy does not mean you have to be rude to your fellow man.  Part of a great restaurant is customer service and treating people with kindness and respect.  If you want an authentic, friendly and fun dining experience, don't come here.  Really one of the most insulting experiences I've ever had.  Not nice.

bNAI8adgOi8yd01TZbGxUg.text: The door man was very rude to us. Especially one that was named Angel. I havwnt seen such an attitute anywhere else.I normally don't leave bad reviews, yet they do deserve it.If you want to feel discriminated, do go to this place.Do you want to feel humiliated, this is the place to spoil your trip.

KvE7l0tHDSK8h8rmX7JHrg.text: Best sushi I have ever eaten. Loved the vibe the restaurant gave off also. Can't wait to go back next time I visit London!

XZKw9jpLQBp09Q04vEyLEw.text: I have not been to the Asian part of the restaurant but the Italian one is good, plain good not excellent.  Truffle Pizza and Carpaccio are nice but nothing out of the ordinary.  Risotto arrived cold and Breem although cleaned afore served was full of spines!The mango tiramisu comes in a small glass, more in line with a casual cafe than with a classy restaurant.Finally the bar is nothing to get worked for,, it's just expensive and full of mean looking bouncers.  The very high prices were not justified at all you will be surrounded by people trying to show that they have a lot of money! Mostly visitors from Middle East and Russia with more money than taste!

Njgv37N0z3QMxxlB3B1O9g.text: Great food, and excellent lounge bar in the basement. Has 2 restaurant options - Asian and Italian. We tried the Italian place, and loved it. There was a weird time limitation of 2 hrs for dinner table, which seemed to be common in London. Overall, had a great time at this place.

P-swQKpr5gl_avxrgAwMZw.text: I don't know.  The room is over the top flashy( in a good way) , the wait staff are truly great, the people watching is awesome and it's a lot of fun.  But it's super expensive and the food is just ok.   Do it if you're on someone else's bill but if it's your hard earned money you can do much better in London.

WaTx7VIiV4dtyirerBS_Qg.text: I've been to both the Italian and Asian parts. Love how enjoyable the Italian side is for hangouts. However I prefer the Asian side for the food. Love the spicy edamame while waiting for our food and the sushi is great, amazing noodles too. Great food over all in both sides. Hate the service.

LA8G17pyJ5aGQIXbW6Wl5w.text: This restaurant has an Asian and Italian restaurants within it. I tried the Italian. The setting is very pretty and elegant. The service is also excellent. The food is also well above average and very fresh. During lunch, they have a 2, 3, and 4 course options (two is plenty)Prices are surprisingly much less than you would expect from such an upper end restaurant, especially at such a location. (50 pounds for two people, no alcohol). I walk by this place at night and their bar area is a very happening spot in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Fresh fish
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Fresh and visible kitchen
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Large space

ln1xpAK214HVb_6MMfnlaQ.text: I think this must be where villains in James Bond movies eat. Stupidly expensive, but worth the price of admission to fulfil your fantasy of being surrounded by trained mercenaries and subversive sinister types. It's kinda unreal. You have to assume that these people have code names and evil trademark skills. At one point you realize that you're probably the only person in the room who isn't accompanied by a stunning supermodel.   So you order the pasta.    It's spectacular.   You start to daydream of yourself taking on the role of maniacal henchman code-named 'Noodles'.   You know that the next time you return to this place you'll be decked out in a form fitting snakeskin suit.  Wearing a monocle.  With a beautiful vixen named Antipasta dangling off your arm.    You snap awake.   The comprehensive wine-list both captivates and infuriates you at the same time. Sure, you've had vehicles that cost less than some bottles here.  But you know that that's part of the allure.  After a hard day of planning heists, you want to relax with something that's truly special.One of those places that has the rare ability to transform the subjective distortion from which you see the world.

VAAHd-cIeYvMD9ZW_0JaYg.text: Everything is wonderful. The food is memorable. All dishes we tasted were superb. The staff is friendly and helpful. A place to see and be seen. Pricey but it is worth it

OX6w0QaUuzolVRrQ0Le2VA.text: Awful restaurant very racist! I was traveling from the states into London and heard wonderful things from my friends that live in central London so novikov was a must. As we went in for a table the hostess said nothing was avail. On my way our a door guy said he has a table but I'd have to spend a minimum of 200pounds lol okay. We sat the hostess came over and kept pressuring us at the table to pay the 200pounds upfront. Mind you this is a restaurant!!!!! Not a club!!!!i ended up paying it nonthless we only spend 165pounds and just decided to get two shots that got us to 200pounds. This is ridiculous they did not treat all the other walk in guest this way and by this way I mean they did not ask the other walk in guest to pay upfront or even a minimum. We were there for about 2hrs plenty of tables avail with the two hours we were there. Will never go back here ever. But the food was definitely good. Service terrible!!!!!

hyzbh-zkXeKTXVJO1VU2hA.text: This location has two full restaurants (one Illatian and one Asian). The place is truly beautiful. I tried the Itallian resraurant. The food has great quality and its very fresh. I had Burrata with tomatoes, sea bass carpaccio, seafood salad with scallops, prawns and octopus, Spanish sirloin served with rocket and it was all amazing. Service was also great. Would definitely recommend this restaurant where you are in London .

20LnmSl_tX_N3_HimuGtYQ.text: Super packed it was a hustle even through concierge to get a reservation. I loved the atmosphere I would prefer Asian food over Italian but not at novikov . Their Italian section is wayyy better their Asian. I loved the truffle pizza probably the best I tried so fare.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Their sashimi and sushi wasn't bad but not something memorable. Go for their rolls

lwrU1VkKsuqnnFT2Vp8RQQ.text: Novikov is fantastic. I went as a birthday treat for a friend and from the moment we walked in, the staff made us feel welcome and we're only too happy to make sure that we had a good evening.The food was of excellent quality, the dim sum was surprisingly good by London standards and there was a good selection of different food types from sushi to grills and wok dishes . There was also a bit of a cameo from a  very famous actor however it was refreshing to see that this didn't seem to phase anyone at all! A little bit on the pricier side but I don't think it's  a bad price considering the service, environment and quality of the food on offer. Will definitely be visiting again!

FttuGCn3QpZ7YAS-j1uunw.text: Novikov does incredible dim sum.I never thought I would utter these words, yet alone mean them so deeply.Novikov is owned by Arkady Novikov, one of Russia's most successful businessmen with a span of over 50 restaurants in Moscow before setting his sights on London. For those who don't know, Novikov isn't a new restaurant. It's the 540-seater super-restaurant that opened back in the summer of 2011. It's comprised of an Italian & Pan-Asian restaurant with a lounge bar downstairs.Novikov has some serious sex appeal.As soon as you walk through the doors it feels as if you have entered a secret members club.As we were here for Dim Sum we went to the Asian side; here it's dark, intimate and has THE most incredible display of fresh vegetables & seafood in front of the glassed open kitchen; which gives you the voyeurism without the distraction of noise from peeking at the kitchen in full action. You can request to choose your own dinner for the evening, and can ask for anything from the market to be cooked 'just how you like it.'We sat opposite the market area, so I can face plant against the glass wall and stare longingly at the freshest fish & shellfish; so fresh that I spied the langoustines trying to wriggle away to freedom whilst the lobsters antennae's nervously probed the air. HEAVEN!We went for the lunch Dim Sum menu, where you order in number of portions.You are given the choice of either 5 portions for £25 or 8 portions for £36 (4 dumplings per portion).Mmmhmmm I know what you're thinking, pretty shocked at the affordability of their lunch menu right?! Go quickly before they realise!!Their Dim Sum menu although small, is well-thought out and elevates what you thought you knew about Dim Sum unto a whole new level.We went for the:Spicy Prawn 'Moneybag'Chicken & morel siu maiKimchi wagyu dumplingsShrimp & Coriander dumplingsXiao Long BaoBlack Cod dumplingScallop OliveSteamed prawn, Froi Gras & truffle dumplingsTrust me when I tell you. I have never had Dim Sum quite like this.Every dumpling was a very generous size. Probably the biggest I have ever been presented with, with the name 'Moneybag' in the name you would expect some pretty hefty sized-dumpling balls to come out. And boy oh boy did they not disappoint.Sizeable, and beautiful. No skinny dumplins' here!Each mouthful, was as memorable as the next. The first bite of a Novikov dumpling is something that you will remember for the rest of the year.Taking my initial bite of the Spicy Prawn Moneybag dumpling, I was taken back at how fresh it was and by the fact that there was a full prawn in there.The dumpling casing was so soft yet kept it it's integrity until the first bite. Revealing a crunchy prawn and a very slight hint of spiciness.Now.... I could go and describe each dumpling to you, but they were all so awesome that I would have succumbed into ecstasy by the end of each mouthful, it would have probably turned into some other literature that you could all do with out. SO... I will just mention those that you SHOULD try.The Siu Mai: I will admit that normally, I am not a huge fan of siu mai. It always leave a weird after taste in my mouth that I don't like.But these Chicken & morel siu mai were sublime. The morel added a subtly mushroom flavour that was almost creamy. THE Xiao Long Bao: this is probably one of THE BEST xiao long baos that I have ever had. The huge medallion of meat that was encased the delicate dumpling skin was most definitely floating in a river in soup gushed out like a waterfall on the first bite. It was love at first bite.It was SO good, that I was eye-balling the final last dumpling so hard that FreshMikeEats gave mercy on me and let me have him. SUCCESS! He's mine... my own.... my precious ;DVerdict? Cancel your weekend plans next week right this second, and book yourself in for lunch at Novikov in their Asian room. Order the dim sum & die happy. You will wonder why you didn't have them on speed dial for dim sum lunch Sundays in the first place.yummei.com/2016/06/dim-s…

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

TMcEBZJJPx4ZFLUqmku7Pg.text: The environment and decor is amazing. The restaurant is very nice and cheerful. Enjoy everything from the fresh menu to exotic drinks. The restaurant is very busy and you must get a reservation in advance. The only downfall is the service is a bit slow. As long as your not in hurry and extra time to sit, watch and enjoy.

Bw6D9i-_Gvojg5Y5seWecQ.text: Very expensive but the food was great. Also, the service was quick and the food was very fresh. We ordered the tuna sashimi, crab salad, beef tacos, and all tasted fantastic. I recommend for a nice night out with friends and family. Also, since the restaurant is asian and Italian, you get the best of both worlds!

UtKf_SpvKACnHl4ZcZ02ew.text: This place was super Fresh ,all the food had so much flavor ... my Favs are the king crab , the lamb chops , the Dover sole , the sweet corn dim-sum. This place is also open late night which is nice for a restaurant in this Cailber .

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Lamb chops
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Dover sole is amazing

xY4r9OmPFDdNchMByVI1sw.text: This place is absolutely amazing, the food, the ambiance, and the service is truly 5 star. We've heard a great deal about it, so the first thing we did when arriving in London is head to Novikov. Words don't describe the food and the service. The people are warm and really know how to make you feel like a million bucks. Once done with dinner the party continues in the club downstairs. The manager walked us in and made us feel like VIP's. Novikov is an absolute must!!!

L5chg73T6cERhXTYUVma6g.text: Whenever I'm in London, I also take my friends and family to Novikov. There is so much to choose from it is undoubtedly one of the best places to eat in town. There is an Asian Restaurant, an Italian Restaurant (too salty however), and a Lounge Bar (Friday gets a little too busy) for late night antics. It is absolutely the place to be in the heart of Mayfair. I don't hesitate giving them 5 stars for there wonderful service and great food.Every time I take someone here they are amazed by the aura, food, and service. And it looks good on you too because it makes you look like you know exactly what you're doing.

RL2sOXkIcNGaSkCXh1hJjA.text: Horrible service, the servers are great but the manager has no sense of cudtomrr services.

ArnCf-Hwcvyv9duejS_5Dw.text: Great food.  A little pricey, but all ingredients were so fresh.  We did a pre-fix menu, which was 11 dishes.  We were so full by the end.  Definitely recommend the sashimi, shrimp.  The lamb & king crab was ok.  Dessert was amazing!!Would definitely recommend this restaurant.

A6F4wB-1eXwAb-JZ5OXA6Q.text: It's very glam with lots of uber cool city types and the International jetset! The display of fish and produce is beautiful!It's too noisy to hear what anyone bar the person beside you is saying , but the food is fantastic! Try the scallops with truffle, and all the classics .. the Peking duck is the best in London, they scrape the soft fat away and serve the crispy skin separately .. mouth watering! Service is excellent and quick! It would have 5 stars , but for the noise level!

InIMGJvdMsRNnqA5biCJtQ.text: I have always followed the motto of not judging a book by its cover, so I tried to walk into the double decker restaurant tabula rasa. I was met by stoney-faced Russians who clearly had a problem with me being unsure whose name the reservation was under. As I was meeting at least two people, I couldn't be sure, so I tried a few. This was met with a: "You don't know who you are eating with?" Unappreciated.Moving on...once we were seated (I think the hostess was surprised when my party materialized), the Italian room exudes opulence, albeit in a nouveau riche, Vegas-esque way. The open kitchen with buffet displays of food reminded me of the Carnival Cruise I went on when I was 17. The Italian theme was conveyed through walls with wrought iron grate accents, a ceiling of airy beams, and rustic wooden seating. The service was actually quite fast, no nonsense, and helpful. The food was good- my thin spirally pasta with rabbit ragout was filling and had the right ratio of cheap pasta to rich gamey sauce. They didn't skimp on quality, but for what they are charging, the quality should be fan-effing-tastic. The cheese and truffle pizza was thin, flavorful, and delicious.Apparently the restauranteer's 'Novikov' is the place to see and be seen which is apparent by the clientele, which is suited, glammed up, and ready to take in all that Novikov has to offer. More power to them.

DrR8_NL1I0TIPEaHThAv5A.text: Novikov has that Nobu vibeNice atmosphere, nice service, nice decor.Not a big fan of their langoustine, which I've had twice already... It's pretty bland and fishy (I gave it another shot, even after not liking it the first time, but my experience the second try was the same as the first)I'd give it 3.8 stars... But let's just round it off to 4 !

m-ejnaSeWS_Phh2xUELzPQ.text: Waited for 40 mins for 2 cocktails at quiet period on a Saturday! Had dinner reservation so ended up leaving without drinks! Slow and disorganised! Thank goodness I did not pay upfront!!

40dfeu_eQQKpMkij329yQA.text: One can find everything on the menu. Drinks are amazing and reasonably priced (for Mayfair that is...). If you want asian food - you will be impressed with the choices; otherwise try the italian restaurant below. A 5 star to you from Miami.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Frog Legs

zRmeSkp0aojEGryof-nV3w.text: Ahh it's a Russian bar!! :D And a fancy one too I think :)Place has a really nice layout, you can talk and chill by the bar or there's a whole arrangement of tables you can sit at and talk. We asked the waitress to seat us and she was kind enough to do so, even though it was busy. The bartender didn't know what a Sidecar drink was but perhaps it's not a popular drink in England, so I opted for a Cosmo which was delicious and perfect for my mood :) The bartender offered us tequila shots too. I'm not sure who I would talk to or if I would enjoy the venue here by myself, but to come for drinks/to talk in a nice atmosphere with good friends it's perfect :)

ZusqVS6Ca2LfyifiWpD2MA.text: I'm a world traveller and live in London for 6 years now. Never been treated like this before what it's unacceptable specially when you're paying a ridiculous price for just a table and having to wait 1h40 for food. After several attempts to ask for the food to at least 6 waiters/waitresses I've decided to speak to a manager who didn't really cared about my situation what makes him not very professional. After 1h40 the food arrived and I refused to eat it or pay for as I was leaving already. If at least the staff made me feel like the situation was going to be sorted. But no. 0. Can you imagine my disappointment when I've order first than many and seeing them all getting the food first even when they arrived after me!? Exactly... When I was finally leaving, asked to speak to the main manager who really didn't want to hear what I had to say because the bill was paid already anyway. He ignored me and called the security guys to put me out of the establishment using strength on me like I was a man or like I was drunk when that was not the case at all. Woke up feeling pain in my arms the next morning. Here it's the results of treating custumers badly and inappropriately! If from all the places in London people choose this restaurant and bar to go and pay to be there the minimum you should expect it's good food and an exquisite service! No? To finalise this review if this is how staff from a place with the rating like that treats their customers when they want to complain, specially if they're a woman and not drunk, then I certainly do not recommend it at all. If you want to feel lush and just drink that's an amazing atmosphere and music its good but to eat and specially the service? A big fat 0.It's pretty obvious that these reviews are fake or people been paid to say these compliments or they know nothing about service.

mL8nr4Nwth0sLLI9nBevoA.text: Amazing! First of all, this restaurant is absolutely beautiful inside. There is even a lounge/club downstairs - so you get the best of both worlds Divine food, I mean we ordered lots of different options and each dish I was stunned with how tasty it was, and how different it was from the next. I am an extreme sushi fanatic ( I am from Vancouver BC) I have been to London a few times and I can never get good sushi like back home, this did justice! Presentation is key, each dish both looked and tasted amazingService was impeccable, we were a very large party and they did not slack at all, very impressive.I mean, I can go on lets just let the photos do the talking. Until next time I am in town!

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

jbkb2TpPMvsT8Oo9-lRYFA.text: Never one to come here to rate 1 Star review... but here we go. The food was completely underwhelming. While the only thing we truly enjoyed was scallops/jalapeño sushi (we ended up order 1 more) the rest of it was meh. Especially not for the price. The staff while not outwardly rude but more so snobbish. Which I guess compliments the crowd. Really sad I've listened to my friends who highly recommended it. Might have to rethink some friendships. The drinks were drinks. Can't say I was wowed but the presentation on my drink was pretty. Honestly don't think people come there for the food but to show off in albeit nice decor. That is all. The end.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

fI7AGjhhDjNyaK0bPUqdMA.text: I'm stumbled upon this wonderful restaurant on my layover traveling from Dubai to Los Angeles. I was supposed to propose to my fiancée in Dubai on Valentines Day but we fell asleep and missed our reservation . I had to find a place to do this the right way and my friends in London said "Do it at Novikov" the food was amazing, the staff worked with me to keep it a secret from her while at the table. Thanks Novikov for helping me set my future!!

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

fr7e6tU-oX1YlkSezAaZPw.text: First off I have to say the food is amazing. I would want to go back again but the service is horrible which is disappointing for such a lovely spot. But the thing that really got to me is when it was time to pay the bill. The cashier comes over with her credit card machine standing over us as we are reviewing the bill. I tell her we are paying cash but she just stands there like she is watching over us trying to rush us out or thinks we are going to leave without paying. It got to a point where we had to ask her to come back in a few minutes. She walked away with attitude. It is beyond rude to stand over someone as they counting out cash to pay for their bill. Not sure what takes place here in London but I have never experienced such rudeness. Even though I enjoyed the food we definitely will not be going back and taking our business elsewhere.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Tomahawk steak for two was one of the best steaks I have had in a long time.
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

DEKgi3Jm4j197043hoOBJA.text: The best best best Asian fusion. This was more than a delicious meal it was an incredible experience. I have also experienced the best service I have ever had!!!! This is a landmark and when in town I must visit my favorite Asian Fusion food.

NWT45Feu8uj0OHEAP5O7YA.text: Great place great Italian restaurant.. Space is huge and great food.. Extraordinary tomato salad.. And great turbot fish grilled w fresh tomatoes.. The tomahawk however not so great.. The lobster pasta us excellent and the truffle pizza are really goodPrice is super duper expensive

GdEYWrUNeljuUauDvySnog.text: Didn't eat,only drank vodka in lounge. Great people watching but very expensive minimum spend to sit at a table.

7sX4E0drqiGYkukc_g_CYg.text: Very good place, with excellent quality. The fact that you have an Italian snd Asian place is a nice concept

CUSXtDGgD6WF9xZBF3F9Ww.text: Tables at the club are not worth it. Tons of the hip hop club scene come and block the entire section from view of the dance floor and surround the middle tables (the best tables) from view looking to shark on girls that have had a few drinks by 1am. (They should do something to change this dynamic)Food and service upstairs however is well deserving so this place gets 4 stars.

xgcWcw9w5LMTTSHRSthD_Q.text: Very nice restaurant with two different kinds of cuisine. Don't forget to mention Chinese or Italian when you book.

-RhCyHEYsVwduLdibULHYQ.text: This place has a really cool vibe. Come here on weekends and you'll need a reservation in advance. It's like a restaurant/ club where you can listen to trendy music, have great cocktails and mingle. Not recommended for families at least on the Asian side, it's rather loud. Love having sushi here, the food was prepared well and fresh, which is important when it comes to raw fish. Dress to impress!

56lnYaN6D3YPwF_08TmYjQ.text: Cute location, decent service and everything was delicious!  I had a late dinner with a group around 11pm and it was still packed! Great music playing in the background but not too loud to where you couldn't hold a conversation. Great decor and a very diverse atmosphere which I appreciated seeing.  I would definitely return.  Make sure to make a reservation beforehand!

DGQYbMCdNE5rtjncb2cHLQ.text: Went there for early dinner yesterday. And was kinda disappointed with service. Food was great. But service lacked the oomph you expect from such a high end Resturant. First of all a lady waiter asked for drinks and kept pushing a non-alcoholic cocktail for a 5 year old. Where as we were still deciding for the kid. Once drinks ordered never can during even half way dinner. Then other waiter who took the order forgot Prawn Tempura till the Maine course arrived and gave us wrong sushi rolls when hi we never ordered. Hence I called the manager and he was kind to take those item off the bill and send us a comped salad but I expected more than free food from the Resturant. Anyways I think one in Dubai is par excellence in service and London needs to do better.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

qf5GFe4YnWgYjeQD8ZqeRw.text: Worth every single penny. Started at the bar and got a mojito... yum. The service was super fast, attentive, and the staff was kind and personable. The quality of the food was truly the best i have ever had (ate on the Italian side). The burrata was unreal, the pasta in the Parmesan was nothing like i have had before, and the soft serve with strawberry's was the best ice cream i have ever had. I'm also picky so this is saying a lot (i work in the industry as well). 100% will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

b7xzZ4SwFv-T-rRrqOPCbQ.text: Novikov was in point and living up to the hype the night we visited.  After a rough start with our server, which we've come to expect in London, he made a huge comeback!  We entrusted him with the ordering and he kicked our socks off!  Well crafted, interesting dishes starting with a simple, but unique yellow fin, Jalapeño with uzo sauce and culminating with and incredible crab dish.  The star of the show was crispy duck with fois gras.  We reordered on that one!  Icing on the cake was an unexpected and delish dessert presentation for my daughter's bday. I heard they just opened in Miami.  Can't wait to try it!

iaPwZ19Wkgc0qqPs5-o5tg.text: Sushi has got to be one of my favourite foods, feed me good sushi and I'll be happy for life! Upon arriving we were greeted by a friendly host- Katharina who showed us to our seats, embracing the Asian themed interior. I loved the openness of the kitchen, as it's reassuring to see everything made fresh before you. The open market where you can buy fresh vegetables and seafood is quite inviting and once again emphasises an Asian cultural experience. I've eaten several times at Novikov and this time was no exception before the waiter could ask any questions, I knew exactly what I wanted and how it would taste and I wasn't disappointed! Firstly we started with French Gillardeau no.2 oysters (4 Oysters) a natural aphrodisiac, which is full of protein, vitamins and, minerals, the taste was exquisite, surprisingly, as my preferred preference being Scottish Oysters. Next was Sashimi, now I'm a sucker for Salmon and yellowtail, so I always order the same thing, but I decided to be bold and also order Scallops, which I regretted, not because of the taste, simply because I like what I like and that is Salmon Sashimi paired with Yellowtail Sashimi in Jalapeno peppers ;)For maki rolls, spicy tuna is always my choice, accompanied by lots of Wasabi and soy sauce. I like things spicy! Sometimes when eating a lot of sushi, my mouth tends to feel a bit cold and that's when Dim dum comes into play, Spicy Prawn dim sum was required just lift my tastes buds.And it is always better to finish with a salad, we ordered two duck salads, second mistake as the salad is quite filling and it is best to order one to share. Topped with leafy greensand pomegranates this salad is filled with zest but still remains a meaty taste. White wine was a great choice to pair with Sushi as anything else starts to turn my stomach. I thoroughly enjoyed my night and the atmosphere was nice, as we arrived at 7pm and watched as diners started to flood in, making Novikov full by 9pm.Overall the food was amazing and our host gave us the best customer service, however once in the lounge, the customer service is very poor with staff only serving you if you have a large table. We waited 45 minutes for a drink and it seems you have to be dressed inappropriately to get served!

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom
Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom

K8i8sAqzD3CSiaKZD8JzMQ.text: Reviews of Novikov can be confusing because this one location features two full restaurants; one Italian, one pan-Asian, and a high-end lounge that attracts the rich and beautiful denizens of London. A place to see and be seen. And each one could easily be the subject of its own review. But because they share a name, an entrance, and are managed centrally they are usually rated as a whole. And this isn't really helpful, but as long as you understand this about Novikov, you'll be prepared.I discovered this place quite by chance. I was hungry and tired after an afternoon of walking between the main attractions in Mayfair when rain set in. We wanted a drink and a spot of lunch. I was wet and ready to sit when we turned the corner and this glamorous jewel caught our eye. I had been prepared for something more casual, but we were lured in as if compelled by a beautiful mirage. No sooner were we in the door than we were overwhelmed by the immediate and attentive service. Our hosts descended, took our coats, made a greeting and asked "Asian or Italian?" I didn't expect a choice and this threw me for a second, but the fresh Seafood bar had already caught my eye and anything from the Far East is go-to cuisine for me, so the the Italian option never stood a chance. And in we went.  The place truly is beautiful and welcoming with warm and inviting aesthetics and service that could easy seem suffocating, but somehow doesn't. Welcomes were exchanged, stories of their origin, drinks orders taken and the menu explained. We were were in good hands. But as I settled in I realized that this is their schtick. Norikov is an expensive, upscale, high touch, and focused on exceptional presentation and execution. Service that dotes, a menu that has something for all, and food that is well prepared with excellent flavors, great texture, and wonderful diversity. As a Seattle native I'm a bit of a snob when it comes to good seafood and Asian cuisine. And I was delighted. Their dishes are some of the best I've had anywhere in East Asia and Japan, and especially in Europe.We were given a tour as well of their Italian restaurant after our meal, and I have no doubt it's equally impressive, though the decor did feel much more staged. And this perhaps touches on the one thing that is unusual about Novikov. Which is the distinctively "Russian oligarch" sense of status and privilege this place exudes. It's hard to quantify but it's palpable. There's a sense that you either belong, or you don't, and the staff is here to reward those that do. The place is exclusive, and probably a bit unapproachable to some. And for those of us who don't observe or appreciate status, it can be off putting. But the dining and food experience were worth it, and so given the chance, I think you should check it out.

photos.caption: Photo of Novikov - London, United Kingdom. Seafood and produce bar

yLz09gnZEbzNkcy6kt5p3w.text: Great food, amazing ambience, so many beautiful people. Service is outstanding! Prefect place for a romantic dinner or Friday night outing with friends.
